detail_desc: Body in ribbed jersey with a square neckline, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Short, elasticated necklaces to give your spooky outfit an even more terrifying touch. One necklace has a bat-shaped pendant.

Jumper in rib-knit cotton with a polo neck and long raglan sleeves. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Leggings in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Wide shirt in sturdy, organic cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Bolero in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads with long sleeves and flower-shaped buttons at the top. Scalloped, ribbed trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
All-in-one suit in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs. Length 52 cm, 62 cm and 66 cm.
Aviator-style,tinted sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Hat in a soft rib knit with faux fur pompoms on top.
Maxi dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and short sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and high slits in the sides.
Calf-length, off-the-shoulder lace dress with elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a batik pattern. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Shorts in soft slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with lace details. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and long, wide sleeves with lace trims.

Oversized jacket in a soft wool blend with a collar, buttons down the front, large flap chest pockets and discreet pockets in the side seams. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with pleats at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shopper in patterned cotton canvas with two handles at the top, one decorated with detachable faux fur, lemon-shaped pompoms. Size of shopper 16x30x39.5 cm.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt, zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.

Kaftan in an airy, striped cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons at the top and a gathered yoke at the back. 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs with a slit. Rounded hem with high slits in the sides.
Cycling shorts in jersey containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and decorative buttons at the top. Short sleeves with a tie detail, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with twisted side seams and short raglan sleeves.
Ankle-length trousers in soft viscose jersey with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Joggers with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a print motif on one leg, side pockets and one back pocket. Tapered legs with contrasting colour panels down the sides and ribbed hems.
5-pocket, calf-length skirt in cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slit at the front. Unlined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details. Detachable hood, zip down the front, fleece-lined front pockets and inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs. Brushed fleece inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck, button placket and chest pocket. Gathered yoke at the back, gathered shoulder seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

prod_name: TP ALBIN basic rib l/s 2p SB
detail_desc: Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.

Set with a hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend and a pair of leggings in cotton jersey. Hoodie with a double-layered hood, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.
Lace thong briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a text appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Leggings in glittery jersey with a wide, foldover waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Short, fitted dress in sequined mesh with a concealed zip at the back and long sleeves with a concealed zip at the cuffs. Jersey lining.
Ankle-length trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and slits front and back. Unlined.
Long T-shirt in hard-washed slub cotton jersey with raw, roll edges and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Longer at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a nepped texture. Unlined hood with a contrasting colour drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Gently tailored jacket in a textured-weave viscose blend with a shawl collar, no buttons, pockets in the side seams and sleeves with gathered seams. Lined.
Fully lined tankini with a top and bikini bottoms. Top with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and matching bottoms.
Short, boxy top in jersey with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, shoulder pads and long dolman sleeves.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Striped swim shorts in a recycled polyester weave. Extended waistband with a button, concealed drawstring and elastication at the back, and a zip fly with a concealed button. Discreet side pockets, a welt back pocket with a concealed zip, and short slits in the sides. Mesh inner shorts.
Boots in imitation leather with a moccasin seam and lacing at the front, loop at the back and decorative welt seam around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
Trainers in cotton canvas with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton with contrasting colour panels along the shoulders and sleeves.
5-pocket ankle-length trousers in striped, stretch cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, and straight, wide legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.
Pyjamas with a jersey top and flannel bottoms. Top with a flannel front pocket and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves, short legs and press-studs down the front and along one leg.
Crop tops in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Plastic water bottle with a non-drip, push-button lid and a practical carry strap at the top. Capacity 600 ml.
Boxy-style T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in a pattern-weave cotton blend with elastication at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with ties. Elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Metal hoop earrings with text cut-outs. Diameter 4.5 cm.

Knee-length, double-breasted trenchcoat in a stretch weave with a wide collar and concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Shoulder tabs with a button, a detachable belt at the waist, side pockets and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in fluted, crinkled fabric with a low waist and high cut at the back.
Top in patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, ties at the sides, and 3/4-length sleeves.
Tube scarf knitted in soft chenille.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a print motif on the front, slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Longer and rounded at the back.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in jersey with a high, elasticated waist and a slit at the front.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and zipped side pockets. Unlined.

Cargo joggers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist in a relaxed fit with a zip fly and button and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a hook and loop fastener, decorative zips and flap leg pockets. Tapered legs with elasticated hems.
T-shirt in soft, airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a slightly lower neckline at the front.

Maxi dress in an airy crêpe weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and smocking at the back. Cut-out section with narrow, covered elastic across the back, and a flared skirt with a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with wide, elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Brushed inside.
Cap in woven fabric with a motif and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short, smocked top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an overlocked hem.
5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and tapered legs.
Blouse in an airy, patterned, crinkled weave with a small stand-up collar and concealed buttons and flounces at the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Cotton cap with a print motif. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft, gently draping cashmere blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
